DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study detect specific profile breath healthy subject untargeted metabolomic study use exhale breath analysis mass spectrometry .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Normal spirometry ( forced expiratory volume 1 second ( FEV1 ) > 80 % , force vital capacity ( FVC ) > 80 % , FEV1/FVC > 70 % . ) . 2 . Age 18 90 year study entry . 1 . Presence active malignancy . 2 . Presence lung disease ( e.g . asthma , chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) , sarcoidosis ) 3 . Acute inflammatory disease ( e.g . common cold ) within last 6 week . 4 . Acute chronic hepatic disease . 5 . Renal failure renal replacement therapy .
